name: Cops and Robbers (Just Another Coder)
description:
Cops and Robbers game made with Python Pygame!

Catch all the robbers before the time runs out! Get powerups to make you faster or if the robber gets to them first you move slower!

This was made for the PyWeek 31 Game Jam competition. Final Submission and Source Code can be seen here: https://pyweek.org/e/justanotherteam/
